meanings.definition: A person who attends a symposium.
meanings.sent1: The symposiasts gathered to discuss important topics.
meanings.sent2: The symposiasts listened attentively to the speaker at the symposium.
meanings.sent3: The symposiasts joked and laughed during the break at the symposium.
meanings.sent4: The symposiasts were like curious bees buzzing around the hive of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The symposiasts were a diverse group, each bringing their unique perspective to the symposium.

meanings.sent1: All the symposiasts shared their views during the panel discussion.
meanings.sent2: The symposiasts engaged in lively debates during the symposium.
meanings.sent3: The symposiasts exchanged ideas like traders in a bustling marketplace.
meanings.sent4: The symposiasts were the stars of the intellectual show.
meanings.sent5: The symposiasts were like puzzle pieces fitting together to create a complete picture at the symposium.
